effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.
